entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 15.
